Chapter Previous Next

class gstBoundingCube

Represents a cube aligned with the x, y, and z axis which contains a volume of space.

From header file: gstBoundingCube.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBoundingCube
gstBoundingCubeThis constructor creates valid gstCube for minPt and maxPt of a valid cube.
~gstBoundingCube
Functions
backCenter Returns gstPoint coincident with the center of the back side of this cube.
bottomCenter Returns gstPoint coincident with the center of the bottom side of this cube.
frontCenter Returns gstPoint coincident with the center of the front side of this cube.
getBoundingSphere Returns gstBoundingSphere centered at center of gstBoundingBox and with radius such that gstBoundingBox is just enclosed within the sphere.
getCenter Returns the position of the center of gstBoundingBox.
getLLBCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Lower Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getLLFCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Lower Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getLUBCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Upper Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getLUFCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Upper Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getMaxPoint Returns maximum position (right upper front corner).
getMinPoint Returns minimum position (left lower back corner).
getRLBCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Lower Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getRLFCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Lower Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getRUBCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Upper Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getRUFCube Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Upper Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getSideLength Returns side length of cube.
inside Tests if pt is inside of box.
leftCenter Returns gstPoint coincident with the center of the left side of this cube.
leftLowerBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left lower back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
leftLowerFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left lower front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
leftUpperBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left upper back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
leftUpperFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left upper front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightCenter Returns gstPoint coincident with the center of the right side of this cube.
rightLowerBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right lower back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightLowerFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right lower front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightUpperBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right upper back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightUpperFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right upper front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
setCenter Sets the center of the cube at centerParam.
setSideLength Sets the cube side length to sideLengthParam.
topCenter Returns gstPoint coincident with the center of the top of this cube.
Virtual Functions
intersectIntersects gstBoundingSphere with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
